input2: She has had some dry heaving but no vomiting. She states that she initially had light colored stool and constipation and then had dark colored stool and loose stool and then has had no bowel movements. Pt denies bloody stool or black stool. She hasnot taken her po meds in ___ days. She also c/o back pain which is similar to her usual back pain. She endorses increased fatigue without fevers or night sweats. She thinks her clothes have been looser over past 2 weeks since she has been eating much less. Pt denies dysuria or hematuria.
